name: Create 1CRM tasks and contacts from Shopify orders
description: Every time a new order is created on Shopify, Make will automatically search for that customer in 1CRM using the email address from the Shopify order. If no contact with that email exists, it will create a new contact and store the id of that contact to a variable. After that it will create a new task and add it to that contact's activities. If the contact already exists, it will get the details of that contact, create a new task and add it to that contact's activities.
